Intervention: Sentinel Lymph Node Biopsy With Radiolabeled Methylene Blue
One arm diagnostic using 1 mCi of 125-I Methylene blue dye to find sentinel lymph nodes
Eligibility: No know allergy to iodine, lymphazurin or methylene blue dyes
Patient cannot be pregnant or nursing
Women under the age of 18 will not be eligible
Patients with a known allergy to iodine or methylene blue or lymphazurin blue dyes
Results: The Number of Participants That Have Sentinel Nodes Which Are Radioactive or Blue, or Radioactive and Blue or Have Efferent Blue Lymphatics Leading up to the Sentinel Node(s)
Time frame: intraoperatively; up to 6 hours
Arm/Group Title: Sentinel Lymph Node Biopsy With Radiolabeled Methylene Blue
Arm/Group Description: One arm diagnostic using 1 mCi of 125-I Methylene blue dye to find sentinel lymph nodes
Efferent blue lymphatics leading up to the SLN: 0
